metadata.title: QWRSMYX Grey Bathroom Rugs Orange Rose Floral Bath Mat Flowers Butterfly Decor Memory Foam Soft Absorbent for Living Room Bedroom 17.8x29.5 Inch
features: 1.Soft: Bathroom rugs are filled with high density memory foam and the microfiber Flannel outer material, super soft and cozy, skin-friendly, relieve pressure and fatigue on your feet.
2.Fast water-absorbent: Bath rugs are treated with special techniques to absorb water and dry quickly, keeping your bathroom away from water, and keep clean every day.
3.Design: Bath rugs with Friction particle that can prevent the mat from shifting and skidding, and the back prevents water from seeping to the soft surface.
4.Easy Care: Machine wash in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine or bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or lay to air dry.

5.Usages: These mats rugs can be widely used in various occasions, such as bathroom, kitchen, living room, meeting room, study room, hallway, bedroom, balcony, bathtub side, front of the sink, indoor & outdoor etc.
description: Product description Multiple size Color: Material: microfiber Memory Foam Bathroom mats Features: 1.Soft and Comfortable Bath rugs are filled with high density memory foam and the outer material is microfiber Flannel; Super soft and cozy, skin-friendly, relieve pressure and fatigue on your feet. 2.Fast Water-absorbent Special treated Flannel, high water absorbency, make your feet dry and warm after shower, and the most important is dry quickly. 3.Anti-deformation You can wash the mat through the washing machine, it won't deform. Washing Instruction Hand wash: soak in cold water for 10 minutes, then add washing powder or liquid detergent, brush gently wash,dry in the air. Machine wash: soak in cold water for 10 minutes, then folded twice and put into the washing machine. Do not use chlorine or bleach, tumble dry on low heat or dry in the air. Warm Tips:1.Due to differences in computer monitors, we can't be responsible for variations in color between the actual product and your screen. 2. Please measure the space you want to place this rug, and compare the actual size of these rugs before purchasing to reduce the possibility of buying the wrong size. Service: 100% worry-free refund ,You may troubled by the after-sales problem before. Do not worry. If the bath rug does not satisfy you, we can offer a 100% refund service.
